timeline.message: revert back change not related to ConnectionStateListener
changeConnectionStateListener default to false and resolve comments

timeline.bodyText:
is getServerKey() invoked for every request?
Is it possible to pre-compute the value and cache the URI? I think new URI uses toString and string parsing underneath which is CPU intensive.
timeline.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText:
It is not invoked for each request, only called after we refreshed the address from the gateway. and should only be called once.
I thought can compute it when construct the AddressInformation, but did not end up doing it because since we will only call it when connectionStateListener is enabled.
replies.author: xinlian12

timeline.bodyText: code style: "{" on the same line as if
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText:
don't we need a check inside the method if the feature flag is enabled here?
or if the feature flag is disable this method never is invoked?
timeline.author: moderakh

replies.author: xinlian12

timeline.bodyText:
in my understanding in .Net version we are doing the cache update in the global cache (all regions).
But here we are doing it per region (per GatewayAddressCache).
am I right?
timeline.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText:
In .net version, the cache is also per region (per GatewayAddressCache).
The difference is around when exception happens, which cache to update:
In .net version, all caches (all regions) will be checked and updated if applicable.
In current java, we will get the endpoint from URI serviceEndpoint = this.endpointManager.resolveServiceEndpoint(request);, so we only update the cache for that specific region.
replies.author: xinlian12

timeline.bodyText: the format of the ServerKey URI returned from here needs to exactly match with format of ServerKey URI constructed by RNTBD. as discussed offline please consider making a class for this.
timeline.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText:
Thanks Mo~
Created a static method in RntbdUtils :: getServerKey to be used across
replies.author: xinlian12
